cocteles.name: Margarita
cocteles.description: Tequila, jugo de limón, triple sec.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Combine tequila, lime juice, and triple sec in a shaker with ice. 2. Shake well and strain into a glass with a salted rim. 3. Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocteles.name: Mojito
cocteles.description: Ron, azúcar, limón, soda, menta.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Muddle mint leaves and sugar in a glass. 2. Add lime juice and rum, then fill the glass with ice. 3. Top with soda water and garnish with a mint sprig.

cocteles.name: Piña Colada
cocteles.description: Ron, crema de coco, jugo de piña.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Combine rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice in a blender with ice. 2. Blend until smooth and pour into a chilled glass. 3. Garnish with a pineapple slice and cherry.

cocteles.name: Cosmopolitan
cocteles.description: Vodka, triple sec, jugo de arándano, jugo de limón.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Combine vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice in a shaker with ice. 2. Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass. 3. Garnish with a lime twist.

cocteles.name: Caipirinha
cocteles.description: Cachaça, azúcar, limón.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Muddle lime wedges and sugar in a glass. 2. Fill the glass with ice and add cachaça. 3. Stir well and serve.

cocteles.name: Daiquiri
cocteles.description: Ron, jugo de limón, azúcar.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Combine rum, lime juice, and simple syrup in a shaker with ice. 2. Shake well and strain into a chilled glass. 3. Garnish with a lime twist.

cocteles.name: Old Fashioned
cocteles.description: Whisky, azúcar, amargos, agua.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Muddle sugar and bitters with a splash of water in a glass. 2. Add ice and whiskey, then stir. 3. Garnish with an orange peel and cherry.

cocteles.name: Manhattan
cocteles.description: Whisky, vermut rojo, amargos.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Combine whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters in a mixing glass with ice. 2. Stir and strain into a chilled glass. 3. Garnish with a cherry.

cocteles.name: Mai Tai
cocteles.description: Ron, triple sec, jugo de lima, jarabe de almendra.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Combine rum, lime juice, orgeat syrup, and triple sec in a shaker with ice. 2. Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice. 3. Garnish with a mint sprig and lime wheel.

cocteles.name: Mint Julep
cocteles.description: Bourbon, menta, azúcar, agua.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Muddle mint leaves and sugar with a splash of water in a glass. 2. Fill the glass with ice and add bourbon. 3. Stir and garnish with a mint sprig.

cocteles.name: Tequila Sunrise
cocteles.description: Tequila, jugo de naranja, granadina.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Pour tequila and orange juice into a glass filled with ice. 2. Slowly add grenadine, which will settle at the bottom. 3. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

cocteles.name: Whiskey Sour
cocteles.description: Whisky, jugo de limón, azúcar.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Combine whiskey, lemon juice, and simple syrup in a shaker with ice. 2. Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice. 3. Garnish with a cherry and orange slice.

cocteles.name: Pisco Sour
cocteles.description: Pisco, jugo de limón, jarabe de azúcar, clara de huevo.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Combine pisco, lime juice, simple syrup, and egg white in a shaker. 2. Dry shake (without ice) to emulsify. 3. Add ice and shake again, then strain into a glass. 4. Garnish with a few drops of bitters.

cocteles.name: Tom Collins
cocteles.description: Ginebra, jugo de limón, azúcar, soda.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Combine gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup in a shaker with ice. 2. Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice. 3. Top with soda water and garnish with a lemon slice.

cocteles.name: Sex on the Beach
cocteles.description: Vodka, licor de durazno, jugo de arándano, jugo de naranja.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Combine vodka, peach schnapps, cranberry juice, and orange juice in a shaker with ice. 2. Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice. 3. Garnish with an orange slice.

cocteles.name: Bloody Mary
cocteles.description: Vodka, jugo de tomate, jugo de limón, salsa Worcestershire, tabasco, sal, pimienta.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Combine vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco, salt, and pepper in a shaker with ice. 2. Shake gently and strain into a glass filled with ice. 3. Garnish with a celery stick and a lemon wedge.

cocteles.name: Gin Tonic
cocteles.description: Ginebra, tónica, lima.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Fill a glass with ice. 2. Add gin and top with tonic water. 3. Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocteles.name: Blue Lagoon
cocteles.description: Vodka, curaçao azul, jugo de limón.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Combine vodka, blue curaçao, and lemonade in a shaker with ice. 2. Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice. 3. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

cocteles.name: Negroni
cocteles.description: Ginebra, vermut rojo, Campari.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Combine gin, sweet vermouth, and Campari in a mixing glass with ice. 2. Stir and strain into a glass filled with ice. 3. Garnish with an orange peel.

cocteles.name: Aperol Spritz
cocteles.description: Aperol, prosecco, soda.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Fill a glass with ice. 2. Add Aperol, prosecco, and a splash of soda. 3. Stir gently and garnish with an orange slice.

cocteles.name: French 75
cocteles.description: Ginebra, champaña, jugo de limón, azúcar.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Combine gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup in a shaker with ice. 2. Shake well and strain into a champagne flute. 3. Top with champagne and garnish with a lemon twist.

cocteles.name: Bellini
cocteles.description: Champaña, puré de durazno.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Pour peach puree into a champagne flute. 2. Top with champagne and stir gently.

cocteles.name: Moscow Mule
cocteles.description: Vodka, cerveza de jengibre, jugo de limón.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Fill a copper mug with ice. 2. Add vodka and lime juice. 3. Top with ginger beer and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocteles.name: Paloma
cocteles.description: Tequila, jugo de toronja, soda, sal.
cocteles.preparation: 1. Rim a glass with salt and fill with ice. 2. Add tequila and grapefruit juice. 3. Top with soda and garnish with a grapefruit slice.

eventos.name: Fiesta de Año Nuevo
eventos.description: Celebra el Año Nuevo con nosotros.

eventos.name: Noche de Salsa
eventos.description: Ven a bailar salsa toda la noche.

eventos.name: Torneo de Póker
eventos.description: Participa en nuestro emocionante torneo de póker.

eventos.name: Concierto de Jazz
eventos.description: Disfruta de una noche de jazz en vivo.

eventos.name: Fiesta de Disfraces
eventos.description: Vístete con tu mejor disfraz y gana premios.

eventos.name: Cata de Vinos
eventos.description: Prueba una selección de vinos exquisitos.
